column2: "Afei nna ɔbarimba nyimpa kunyin bi wɔ hɔ a ne dzin dze Kish a ɔyɛ Benjaminnyi; nna ɔyɛ Abiel a n'egya nye Zeror no ne ba. Zeror yɛ Bekorat a n'egya nye Afia no ne ba."
"Nna ɔwɔ babanyin bi a ne dzin dze Saul
column3: aberantsɛ a n'enyim wɔ nyam: na nyimpa a obiara nnyi Israelmba no nyinara mu a n'enyim wɔ nyam sen no: ofi n'abatsir kɔ sor no ɔwar sen ɔman no mu obiara."

column2: "Na Saul n'egya Kish no nsoasopɔnkɔ yewee. Na Kish see ne ba Saul dɛ
column3: Afei fa nkowaa no mu kor ka woho
column4: na soɛr kɔ

column2: "Na okekyimaa Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu
column3: na okekyimaa Salisa asaase no do
column4: na oennhu hɔn: na okekyimaa Saalim asaase do
column5: na wonnyi hɔ: na okekyimaa Benjaminfo asaase do

column2: "Na aber a wɔbaa Zuf asaase no do no
column3: Saul see n'akowaa a ɔka no ho no dɛ
column4: Bra ma yɛnsan nkɔ; amma m'egya eenngyaa nsoasopɔnkɔ no ho adwendwen na ɔaanndwen hɛn ho."

column2: "Na akowaa no buaa no dɛ
column3: Afei hwɛ
column4: Nyame nyimpa bi wɔ kurow yi mu
column5: na ɔyɛ nyimpa a wodzi no nyi; dza ɔka nyinara ɔba mu: afei ma yɛnkɔ hɔ
column6: annyɛ a ɔbɛka hɛn akwantu yi ho biribi akyerɛ hɛn."

column2: "Nna Saul see n'akowaa no dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: na sɛ yɛkɔ a
column5: ebɛnadze na yɛdze bɛma ɔbarimba no? Na hɛn adze mu edziban asa
column6: na akyɛdze biara nnyi hɔ a yɛdze rekɛma Nyame nyimpa no. Yɛwɔ ebɛnadze?"

column2: "Na akowaa no buaa Saul bio
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Hwɛ
column5: mowɔ dwetɛ dwetɛbona ebupɛn anan mu kor wɔ me nsamu: ɔno na medze bɛma Nyame nyimpa no

column2: "(Nkan no Israel mu
column3: sɛ nyimpa rikebisa Nyame hɔ adze a
column4: mbrɛ ɔse nye yi
column5: Bra ma yɛnkɔ adzehunyi no hɔ: na dza ndɛ wɔfrɛ no Nkɔnhyɛnyi yi nkan no wɔfrɛ no Adzehunyi.)"

column2: "Nna Saul see n'akowaa no dɛ
column3: Mbo na ka; bra
column4: ma yɛnkɔ. Nna wɔkɔr kurow a Nyame nyimpa no wɔ mu no mu."

column2: "Na wɔrofow kurow no n'afowee no wohun nkataasia a worupue akɛsaw nsu
column3: na wobisaa hɔn dɛ
column4: Ana adzehunyi bi wɔ hɔ?"

column2: "Na wobuaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Ɔwɔ hɔ; hwɛ
column4: odzi w'enyim: afei ka woho
column5: na ɔaba kurow no mu ndɛ; na ɔman no wɔ afɔr bɔ no ndɛ wɔ bea sorɔnsorɔm no do:"

column2: "hom du kurow no mu a
column3: ntsɛmara wobohu no ansaana ɔakɔ bea sorɔnsorɔm no do oekedzidzi: na ɔman no nnkedzidzi gyedɛ ɔba ana
column4: osiandɛ ɔno na ohyira afɔr no do; na n'ekyir no hɔn a wɔato nsa afrɛ hɔn no so woedzidzi. Dɛm ntsi afei hom mfow nkɔ; na aber yi ara na hom bohu no."

column2: "Na wɔfowee kɔr kurow no mu. Woruwura kurow no mu no
column3: hwɛ
column4: Samuel puei behyiaa hɔn dɛ ɔrokɔfow akɔ bea sorɔnsorɔm no do."

column2: "Afei nna EWURADZE eyi akyerɛ Samuel da a adze rebɛkye ma Saul aba no dɛ
column4: "Ɔkyena bɛyɛ siseber yi mobɔsoma banyin bi fi Benjamin asaase do wɔ wo hɔ
column5: na sera no ngo hyɛ no panyin wɔ me man Israel do
column6: ma ɔngye me man mfi Filistiafo nsamu: na m'enyi aba me man do

column2: "Na Samuel hun Saul no
column3: EWURADZE see no dɛ
column4: Hwɛ nyimpa a mekaa no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ wo no! Oyiara na ɔbɔhwɛ me man do."

column2: "Nna Saul twee piin Samuel nkyɛn wɔ kuropon no ano
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Meserɛ wo
column5: kyerɛ me mbrɛ adzehunyi no ne fie wɔ."

column2: "Na Samuel buaa Saul na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Emi nye adzehunyi no; hom ndzi m'enyim kan nkɔ bea sorɔnsorɔm no do
column4: na hom nye me bedzidzi ndɛ: na anapa mebɛma akɔ
column5: na mebɛka dza ɔwɔ w'akoma mu nyinara akyerɛ wo."

column2: "Na wo nsoasopɔnkɔ no a wɔyeew ndɛ ndaansa no dze
column3: mma mmfa w'adwen nnkɔ hɔn do
column4: na woehu hɔn. Na woana do na Israel nyinara enyi da? Ana nnyɛ ɔwo na w'egya fie nyinara do bi a."

column2: "Na Saul buae na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Ana mennyɛ Benjaminnyi a mifi Israel mbusuakuw mu ketseaba no mu bi a
column4: na m'ebusua nye Benjamin ebusuakuw mu ebusua ebusua nyinara mu kakraba no bi a? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na eka asɛm a ɔtse dɛm kyerɛ me yi?"

column2: "Na Samuel faa Saul na n'akowaa no
column3: na ɔdze hɔn baa edzidzidan no mu
column4: na ɔmaa wɔtsenaa hɔn a wohyiaa hɔn edzidzi

column2: "Na Samuel see edzibanyɛfo no dɛ
column3: Fa nankum a medze maa wo no a mesee wo dɛ
column4: Fa sie wo nkyɛn no

column2: "Na edzibanyɛfo no kɛfaa aserɛ no
column3: na dza ɔwɔ ho no
column4: na ɔdze besii Saul n'enyim. Na Samuel see dɛ
column5: Hwɛ dza wɔdze esie! Fa si w'enyim na dzi; osiandɛ wɔdze esie wo abɛpem mber a wɔahyɛ no: aber a mesee dɛ
column6: Mirihyia ɔman no. Na Saul nye Samuel dzidzii da no."

column2: "Na wofii bea sorɔnsorɔm no do sianee baa kurow no mu no
column3: ɔnye Saul twetwee nkɔmbɔ wɔ dan etsifi."

column2: "Na wɔsoɛɛr ahanamakye: na ɔbaa dɛ adze rekye no
column3: nna Samuel frɛɛ Saul wɔ dan etsifi dɛ
column4: Soɛr ma minkegya wo kwan. Nna Saul soɛree

column2: "Worukodu kurotsia no
column3: Samuel see Saul dɛ
column4: Ka kyerɛ akowaa no ma ɔmpa ho nkedzi hɛn enyim
column6: ) na ɔwo dze afei gyina hɔ komm ma memma tsie Nyankopɔn n'asɛm."
